name: C. Three-level Laser
statement:
An atom of element X can exist in distinct states with energies . Arkady
wants to build a laser on this element, using a three-level scheme. Here
is a simplified description of the scheme. Three distinct states , and
are selected, where . After that the following process happens:
initially the atom is in the state , we spend energy to put the atom in
the state , the atom emits a photon with useful energy and changes its
state to the state , the atom spontaneously changes its state to the
state , losing energy , the process repeats from step 1. Let’s define
the energy conversion efficiency as , i. e. the ration between the
useful energy of the photon and spent energy.Due to some limitations,
Arkady can only choose such three states that .Help Arkady to find such
the maximum possible energy conversion efficiency within the above
constraints.
